Palladium

Palladium

Name: Palladium

Formula: Pd

Atomic Number: 46

Group: 10

Block: d

Relative Atomic Mass: 106.42

Discovery Date: 1803

Appearance: A shiny, silvery-white metal

Uses: Catalytic converters, jewellery, dental fillings/crowns, ceramic capacitors.

Atomic Structure:2,8,18,18,0
